Like Reply  1 Reaction   2 Reactions [...] # Brace Sproul‚Äôs Post

Brace Sproul

 Report this post

üßëüíªExcited to announce Ambient Agents! Today we're releasing our first ambient agent of the week - an executive AI email assistant. This agent is built on top of a pattern we believe will be widely adopted throughout the agents released this year, and in years to come. Ambient agents are AI applications which can suggest actions to the user, then await your approval, feedback, or edits before executing the action. This pattern enables whole hosts of agent applications which would not have been fully trusted by users before, like an email assistant. Check out the free hosted executive AI email assistant here:  And the open source code here:

data.title: Brace Sproul's Post
data.snippet:
# Brace Sproul‚Äôs Post

Brace Sproul

 Report this post

I had a great time talking about the future of human <> LLM interactions at Cloudflare last night!

Cloudflare

1,114,959 followers

Cloudflare co-hosted with TQ Ventures almost 200 developers in our SF office on the first night of developer week to talk about AI! Speakers included LangChain engineer Brace Sproul, OpenAI solutions architect Prashant M., and OpenAI solutions engineer Dave Leo, and South Park Commons founder fellow Jonathan Mortensen.

data.title: Thrilled to release what I've been working on for the past ~month ...
data.snippet:
# Brace Sproul‚Äôs Post

Brace Sproul

Head of Applied AI @ LangChain

 Report this post

Thrilled to release what I've been working on for the past ~month, and what we've been using for the last 3 weeks to manage, curate and post community content on LangChain's social! The social media agent has a ton of features, from verifying content is relevant, generating marketing reports, and managing image selection for you! We've made onboarding easy with our quickstart, and if you want to use all of the advanced features it supports, we have an in depth setup guide too! To top it all off, I released a YouTube video walking you through how it works, and how to set it up:  See the open source code here: 

466,872 followers [...] 9mo

Community building should be the goal for our engagement strategies. When we do make a connection‚Äîwhether it's through comments on our posts, Stories, DMs, etc.‚Äîwe need to nurture that lead. That pull can be a key differentiator in a world of content push. ‚Äì‚Äì I feel like there's a bit of a disconnect between 1 and 2, because creating content that's authentic to me often means talking about the full range of things I'm engaged with. So I'm working more on number three, as I think it can be a powerful one on its own. ‚Äì‚Äì What are you doing to adapt to the evolving social media landscape these days? Read

data.title: Brace Sproul | Applied AI Engineer
data.snippet:
### LangGraph.js

Framework to build resilient language agents as graphs. The TypeScript implementation of LangGraph.

### FULLSTACK AI APPS/AGENTS

### Open Canvas

A better UX for chat, writing content, and coding with LLMs.

### Agent Inbox

An inbox UX for interacting with human-in-the-loop agents.

### Agent Chat UI

Web app for interacting with any LangGraph agent (PY & TS) via a chat interface.

### Social Media Agent

An agent for sourcing, curating, and scheduling social media posts with human-in-the-loop.

### MORE OPEN SOURCE PROJECTS

Check out my curated list of awesome LangGraph.js projects, tutorials, and resources. This repository contains a full list of open source AI projects, YouTube videos, and other resources for learning about and building with LangGraph.js. [...] ### CONNECT

¬© 2025 BRACE SPROUL. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. [...] September 2022 - January 2023

As a contract software engineer, I worked on small-medium sized projects for a range of clients, using a full-stack approach with technologies including TypeScript, GraphQL, PostgreSQL and Firebase to deliver high-quality solutions, services and applications.

### 510 Kickz LLC

Berkeley CA

Founder

July 2017 - September 2021

Founded a bulk aftermarket distribution company that specialized in footwear and apparel. Over $1M in lifetime sales with hundreds enterprise scale businesses, and direct to consumer.

## OPEN SOURCE

### LIBRARIES I'M A CORE MAINTAINER OF

### LangChain.js

Build context-aware reasoning applications. A TypeScript framework with millions of monthly downloads.

### LangGraph.js
